summary: The team discussed UCC filing processes and how they should be tracked in Salesforce. The main focus was on unifying business processes around UCC filings and addressing current tracking limitations. There was detailed discussion about when UCC filings occur, their relationship to liens, and how they relate to different deal stages.
key_topics: Title status vs UCC filing distinction
UCC filing expiration and termination tracking
decisions: UCC filings will be tracked at the opportunity level rather than collateral level
UCC filings will be required for all commercial loans, not just non-titled items
action_items: Need to implement tracking for UCC filing expirations
Need to implement tracking for UCC terminations
Remove UCC filing from vehicle title status dropdown (identified as bad data)
concerns: Current UCC tracking in Salesforce is not proper or clean
No current tracking of UCC filing expirations (5-year term)
No current tracking of UCC terminations
Bad data structure with UCC filing status in vehicle title dropdown
michael_priorities: Proper tracking of UCC filings in Salesforce
commitments: Charles committed to leaving at 10:45 for physical therapy
Team committed to implementing proper UCC tracking at opportunity level
